attributes.additional_details: She has taken part in great deeds and services in her time in the entertainment industry. She has soldiered through living in a jungle, taken a courageous fall on stage and has dealt with extreme claustraphobia. She deserves to be recognised for these accomplishments to provide bravery to not only the UK but the world
attributes.background: Make Gemma Collins get knighted by the Queen

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
